section.heading: District Council authority over elections.
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this chapter or of any other law, the Council shall have authority to enact any act or resolution with respect to matters involving or relating to elections in the District.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: District of Columbia administration, self-government, supersession of inconsistent laws, see § 1-207.61.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 1-207.17, § 1-207.61, and § 1-636.02.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Definitions applicable: The definitions contained in § 1-201.03 apply to this section.
